Rule: Gender Rule: If the gender changes from Female to Male, then the income prediction changes from 0 to 1.
Marital Status Rule: If the marital status changes from Widowed to Married, then the income prediction changes from 0 to 1.
Hours Per Week Rule: If the hours per week worked significantly increase (e.g., from 40 to 50 or more), then the income prediction changes from 0 to 1.
Age Rule: If the age is significantly higher (e.g., from 46 to 67), then the income prediction changes from 0 to 1.
